mapper.update: update RTS_CUSTOMER_CONFIG set MD_ID = #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, MD_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, GROUP_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_CUSTOMER_CONFIG where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, MD_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, GROUP_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_CUSTOMER_CONFIG where DEL_FLG = '0'

select cc.PK_ID, cc.MD_ID, cc.NAME, cc.DESCRIPTION, cc.GROUP_ID, cc.NOTE, cc.DEL_FLG, cc.CRT_USER, cc.CRT_TIME, cc.UPT_USER, cc.UPT_TIME,md.NAME as MD_NAME,md.TOPIC as MD_TOPIC,ds.NAME as DS_NAME,ds.TYPE as DS_TYPE from RTS_CUSTOMER_CONFIG cc LEFT JOIN RTS_METADATA md ON cc.MD_ID=md.PK_ID LEFT JOIN COM_DATASOURCE ds ON md.DS_ID=ds.PK_ID where cc.DEL_FLG = '0' and cc.MD_ID = #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cc.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and ds.NAME like '%'||#{dsName}||'%' and md.NAME like '%'||#{mdName}||'%' and md.TOPIC like '%'||#{mdTopic}||'%' and ds.TYPE = #{dsType} and cc.DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{describe}||'%' and cc.NOTE like '%'||#{note}||'%' and cc.GROUP_ID LIKE '%'||#{groupId}||'%' and cc.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= cc.CRT_TIME and cc.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= cc.UPT_TIME and cc.CRT_USER like '%'||#{crtUser}||'%' and cc.UPT_USER like '%'||#{uptUser}||'%' order by cc.UPT_TIME desc, cc.CRT_TIME desc, cc.NAME asc
select PK_ID, MD_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, GROUP_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_CUSTOMER_CONFIG where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
